reviewText: I loved this movie when I saw it a hundred years ago. I am so glad it came out on CD.

I saw this when I was 11 and liked it. If you like Hammer films you might like this. Same writer & some actors. Video was taken from a VHS tape looks like tape not DVD! I still liked it.(Horror Hotel)
There is nothing like the old horror movies. For in it, they still recognize the power and the fear of the cross.
If you're a fan of scarey movies that truly scare without all the blood and gore then this classic movie is for you.
